alert.note: Alert for Wilkes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wilkes County through 500 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buck, or near Wilkesboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Wilkesboro... Wilkesboro... Windy Gap... Mulberry... Wilkesboro Reservoir... Buck... and Millers Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northwestern North Carolina...and southwestern Virginia.
